```{r clean_data, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
clean_tables <- function(df_in, year) {
    df_out <- df_in %>%
    separate(Overall, c("wins", "losses", "ot_losses"), "-") %>%
    mutate(year = year)
}


```
